name: Idle Catfarmia
description:
Idle Catfarmia is an idle farming management game. Help the cat fairies to arrange resources, produce and harvest crops, and manage the farm. The more efficiently the farm grows, the richer your pockets become. Show some clicking skills to unwelcome visitors who occasionally appear on the farm.

Features





  • 24 different types of resources and free resource placement
Resources are divided into three categories: plants, animals, and minerals, with 8 types each.
You can place resources wherever you want and receive additional production bonuses depending on the placement.




  • 5 types of cat fairies
Five different cat fairies assist in resource production.
Summon the higher-level fairies to increase the overall productivity of the farm.




  • Growth balance that changes according to the player
The farm does not grow at a fixed rate. The growth rate of the farm varies depending on the proper replacement and efficient placement of resources.
Whether you manage the farm slowly or efficiently is up to you.
